entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
